verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, know <S%G1492><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> entering in <S%G1529><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it hath <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> been found vain <S%G2756><s%>:

but235, 2532 having suffered before <S%G4310><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> been shamefully treated <S%G5195><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> Philippi <S%G5375><s%>, we waxed bold <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> conflict <S%G73><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> error <S%G4106><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> we have been approved <S%G1381><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to be intrusted with <S%G4100><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> proveth <S%G1381><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%> were we <S%G1096><s%> found using words <S%G3056><s%> of flattery <S%G2850><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> a cloak <S%G4392><s%> of covetousness <S%G4124><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> is witness <S%G3144><s%>;

nor <S%G3777><s%> seeking glory <S%G1391><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> from <S%G575><s%> others <S%G243><s%>, when we might <S%G1410><s%> have <S%G1511><s%> claimed <S%G1722><s%> authority <S%G922><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> we were <S%G1096><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> in the midst <S%G1722><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, <S%G302><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> when a nurse <S%G5162><s%> cherisheth <S%G2282><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> own children <S%G5043><s%>:

even so <S%G3779><s%>, being affectionately desirous <S%G2442><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, we were well pleased <S%G2106><s%> to impart <S%G3330><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our own <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%>, because <S%G1360><s%> ye were <S%G1096><s%> become very dear <S%G27><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye remember <S%G3421><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> travail <S%G3449><s%>: <S%G1063><s%> working <S%G2038><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, that <S%G4314><s%> we might <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> burden <S%G1912><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, we preached <S%G2784><s%> unto <S%G1912><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are witnesses <S%G3144><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G5613><s%>, how holily <S%G3743><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteously <S%G1346><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unblameably <S%G274><s%> we behaved ourselves <S%G1096><s%> toward you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%>:

as <S%G2509><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> we dealt with each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> with his <S%G1438><s%> own children <S%G5043><s%>, exhorting <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G2532><s%>, and encouraging <S%G3888><s%> you <S%G2532><s%>, and testifying <S%G3140><s%>,

to the end that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> worthily <S%G516><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> calleth <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

And for <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> without ceasing <S%G89><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%>, when ye received <S%G3880><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the message <S%G3056><s%>, even the word of God <S%G2316><s%>, ye accepted <S%G1209><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> as the word <S%G3056><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> in truth <S%G230><s%>, the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> worketh <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, became <S%G1096><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of the churches <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> the same things <S%G5024><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> your own <S%G2398><s%> countrymen <S%G4853><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they <S%G846><s%> did of <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>;

who <S%G3588><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2398><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> drove <S%G1559><s%> out us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are contrary <S%G1727><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>;

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be saved <S%G4982><s%>; to <S%G1519><s%> fill up <S%G378><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> always <S%G3842><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the uttermost <S%G5056><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, being bereaved <S%G642><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a short <S%G5610><s%> season <S%G2540><s%>, in presence <S%G4383><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart <S%G2588><s%>, endeavored <S%G4704><s%> the more exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> desire <S%G4314><s%>:

because <S%G1352><s%> we would fain have <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> once <S%G530><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1364><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hindered <S%G1465><s%> us <S%G2532><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%> of glorying <S%G2746><s%>? Are not <S%G3780><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, before <S%G1715><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus2424, 5547 at <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%>?
